BestSoFar.framework.core.helper

Class ParentManager<C extends ChildOf<P> & EventuallyImmutable,P extends ParentOf<C> & EventuallyImmutable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BestSoFar.framework.core.helper.ParentManager<C,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChildOf<P>

    public class ParentManager<C extends ChildOf<P> & EventuallyImmutable,P extends ParentOf<C> & EventuallyImmutable>
extends Object
implements ChildOf<P>
    A helper object that manages a child's parent in an EventuallyImmutable parent-child hierarchy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParentManager(C managedChild)
      Create a ParentManager to manage the given child's parent, which is initially set to null.
      ParentManager(C managedChild, P parent)
      Create a ParentManage to manage the given child's given parent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Called after the managed child has been deleted.
      void beforeFixAsVersion(VersionInfo versionInfo)
      Called before the managed child is fixed.
      C withParent(P newParent)
      Return a version of this with the given parent.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface BestSoFar.framework.core.common.ChildOf

        getParent

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParentManager

        public ParentManager(@NonNull
             C managedChild)
        Create a ParentManager to manage the given child's parent, which is initially set to null.

      • ParentManager

        public ParentManager(@NonNull
             C managedChild,

        Create a ParentManage to manage the given child's given parent.

        managedChild - the child who's parent this will manage.
        parent - the child's parent.

    • Method Detail

      • withParent

        public C withParent(P newParent)
        Description copied from interface: ChildOf
        Return a version of this with the given parent.

        If this object can be mutated it will be, with this being returned. Otherwise a clone of this will be created with the given parent.

        Specified by:
        withParent in interface ChildOf<P extends ParentOf<C> & EventuallyImmutable>
        Parameters:
        newParent - the parent to be given to the returned object.
        Returns:
        a version of this with the given parent.

      • afterDelete

        public void afterDelete()
        Called after the managed child has been deleted.

        If the child has a parent that wasn't deleted, this method removes the child from it.

      • beforeFixAsVersion

        public void beforeFixAsVersion(VersionInfo versionInfo)
        Called before the managed child is fixed.

        One of two scenarios caused this update

        1. A property of the parent was changed

        2. A property of the managed child was changed

        Parameters:
        versionInfo - the new version information.
